movie_results.title: My Left Foot: The Story of Christy Brown
movie_results.original_title: My Left Foot: The Story of Christy Brown
movie_results.overview: In this true story told through flashbacks, Christy Brown is born with crippling cerebral palsy into a poor, working-class Irish family. Able only to control movement in his left foot and to speak in guttural sounds, he is mistakenly believed to have a intellectual disability for the first ten years of his life.
